```pddl
[
  (:action cook
    ; Cook a meal in a location and update the state of the location and the agent
    :parameters (?agent - person ?location - place ?meal - food)
    :precondition (and
      (at ?agent ?location)
      (clean ?location)
      (not (cooked ?agent ?meal))
    )
    :effect (and
      (cooked ?agent ?meal)
      (messy ?location)
    )
  )
]
```
